column1: Funeral Services will be held on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at The Dangler Funeral Home of West Orange
column4: 340 Main Street in West Orange at 8:30AM. Then to Our Lady of Lourdes Church
column5: 1 Eagle Rock Ave. West Orange for the Funeral Mass at 9:30 AM. Interment will follow at Gate of Heaven Cemetery in East Hanover. Visitation will be held on Tuesday from 4-8 PM.
